verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let God arise, let His enemies be scattered, Let God arise, let His enemies be scattered, Let God arise, let His enemies be scattered, Let God arise, let God arise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Them God arose and His enemies were scattered , Them God arose and His enemies were scattered , Them God arose and His enemies were scattered , Let God arise, let God arise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
